extendedInfo.description: Similar to the DesignRifts Wallpaper Manager, this app will allow you to download all versions of the Glass Rings series. Instead of charging for each one of these versions individually, one price will allow you to download all versions of the Glass Rings themes. Currently Glass Rings and Christmas Rings are free on the market but this pack includes 13 versions. After you choose a version, just press the save button in the lower left-hand corner and it will download that version for you.So far there is AutisticRings (originally created to support Autism), Black Rings, Blue Rings,Christmas Rings, Cyan Rings, Glass Rings, Green Rings, ICS Rings, Orange Rings, Pink Rings, Red Rings and Yellow Rings.The USA Troops Rings will be added soon, along with different 2 or 3 color combos! Want a color combo, send an email and request it!Introductory Price of 1.99

reviews.title: AWESOME AWESOME!!
reviews.comment: So happy themes r back!!Work w/Go launcher except folders in app draw :(  I used another theme\'s folders&works perfectly! I used\"SLCMOTOR steel themes\".A perfect match in color.&styles look great.Check out his themes.Use all 3 Dev\'s themes.U definitely can\'t loose!!Yeah He\'s back!!It\'s a truly wonderful thing!! AWESOME THANX!!!!Also Looks Great w/STEALTHYCHIEF FOLDERS from his icon pks!Try his,He\'s AWESOME also!
reviews.author: Samantha B.

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Love the rings, best part about this app is having all of them in it!! Love it!
reviews.author: Brennan Huber

reviews.title: O\' YEA!!!
reviews.comment: This icon pack is awesome. Glad to support your work. All you dev\'s and mod\'s are the BEST! Looking forward to more from the team. Thanks much
